_description: Approved content ready to post. Human posts manually at scheduled time.
_usage: Approve: Move approved draft from drafts.json here with postTime
Post: Copy content to Twitter, then move to posted.json with tweetId

_example.content:
Police asking to see your phone? You have the RIGHT to refuse.

Section 37 of the Constitution protects your privacy. A search needs:

- A court warrant, OR
- Your voluntary consent, OR  
- Lawful arrest with reasonable grounds

Be polite. Know your rights.
